columns.name: INVOICE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the invoice.

columns.name: VAT_CODE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the vat code.

columns.name: TAX_AMOUNT
columns.description: Amount of tax.

columns.name: TAX_AMOUNT_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the tax amount currency.

columns.name: TAX_AMOUNT_BASE
columns.description: Amount of tax in base currency.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date to be used for any currency conversions; if null, the latest conversion should be used.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the set of exchange rates to use for currency conversions; if null, the default set should be used.

columns.name: VAT_BASIS_AMOUNT
columns.description: The portion of the invoice amount that will be taxed at the rate for the given VAT code

columns.name: VAT_BASIS_AMOUNT_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency of the VAT_BASIS_AMOUNT.

columns.name: VAT_BASIS_AMOUNT_BASE
columns.description: The base amount for the VAT_BASIS_AMOUNT.

columns.name: VAT_RATE
columns.description: The tax rate that the basis amount will be taxed.

columns.name: TAX_AMOUNT_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the tax amount.

columns.name: TAX_AMOUNT_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the tax amount function currency.

columns.name: VAT_BASIS_AMT_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the VAT basis amount.

columns.name: VAT_BASIS_AMT_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the VAT basis function currency.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
